summary: A drama set centered around the war between Russia and Georgia, and focused on an American journalist, his cameraman, and a Georgian native who become caught in the crossfire.
cast: Rupert Friend|Emmanuelle Chriqui|Richard Coyle|Heather Graham|Johnathon Schaech|Rade Serbedzija|Andy Garcia|Val Kilmer|Mikko Nousiainen|Mikheil Gomiashvili|Ana Imnadze|Antje Traue|Kenneth Cranham|Dean Cain|Sergo Shvedkov|Steven Robertson|Alan McKenna|Giorgi Tsaava|Lasha Kankava|Beka Tabukashvili|George Lasha|Kakha Mikiashvili|Natia Metreveli|Lile Oniani|Natalia Gularashvili|Gia Kusikashvili|Lia Suluashvili|Koka Shanava|Anna Walton|Liako Gogidze|Tornike Bziava|Kakha Gogidze|Giorgi Kipshidze|Levan Pirtskhalava|Zurab Ingorokva|Rostom Lortkipanidze|Luke Albright|Jino Jiniuzashvili|Giorgi Ushikishvili|Manana Midelashvili|Ruslan Bakradze|Aleko Gabedava|Nika Tserediani|Malkhaz Abuladze|Natalia Kipshidze|Dali Doijashvili|Nino Jokhadze|Alek Friedman|Zura Javakhia|Konstantin Lavysh|Avi Liani|Beka Sikharulidze|Givi Sikharulidze|Zura Tsintsqiladze|Rick Yudt
